info.title: TelegramMe API
info.description: API implementation of Telegram channel viewer in python

get.summary: Get basic information about the channel
Get more posts from the channel

schema.title: Response More More  Channel   Direction   Position  Get

Channel.title: Channel
Channel.description:
Represents a Telegram channel.

Attributes:
    username (str): The username of the channel.
    title (str): The title of the channel.
    description (str): The description of the channel.
    avatar (str): The URL of the channel's avatar.

ChannelBody.title: ChannelBody
ChannelBody.description:
Represents the body of a Telegram channel.

Attributes:
    channel (Channel): Information about the channel.
    content (Content): Content associated with the channel.
    meta (Meta): Metadata associated with the channel content.

Content.title: Content
Content.description:
Represents the content associated with a Telegram channel.

Attributes:
    counters (List[Counter]): List of counters associated with the channel.
    posts (List[Post]): List of posts in the channel.

ContentPost.title: ContentPost
ContentPost.description:
Represents the content of a post.

Attributes:
    text (Optional[Text]): The text content of the post.
    media (Optional[List[MediaItem]]): List of media items within the post.
    poll (Optional[Poll]): The poll within the post.

Counter.title: Counter
Counter.description:
Represents counters associated with a Telegram channel.

Attributes:
    subscribers (str): The number of subscribers.
    photos (Optional[str]): The number of photos (if available).
    videos (Optional[str]): The number of videos (if available).
    files (Optional[str]): The number of files (if available).
    links (Optional[str]): The number of links (if available).

Date.title: Date
Date.description:
Represents a date.

Attributes:
    string (str): The string representation of the date.
    unix (int): The Unix timestamp of the date.

Duration.title: Duration
Duration.description:
Represents the duration of a media item.

Attributes:
    formatted (str): The formatted duration string.
    raw (int): The duration in seconds.

Footer.title: Footer
Footer.description:
Represents the footer of a post.

Attributes:
    views (Optional[str]): The number of views of the post.
    date (Date): The date of the post.

Forwarded.title: Forwarded
Forwarded.description:
Represents forwarded information within a post.

Attributes:
    name (str): The name of the source where the post was forwarded from.
    url (str): The URL of the source where the post was forwarded from.

HTTPError.title: HTTPError
HTTPError.description:
Represents an HTTP error response.

Attributes:
    detail (str): A human-readable description of the error.

Inline.title: Inline
Inline.description:
Represents a inline block of post.

Attributes:
    title (str): The title inline button.
    url (str): Redirect link for button.

MediaItem.title: MediaItem
MediaItem.description:
Represents a media item within a post.

Attributes:
    url (str): The URL of the media item.
    thumb (Optional[str]): The URL of the thumbnail image (if applicable).
    waves (Optional[str]): The URL of the waveform image (if applicable).
    duration (Optional[Duration]): The duration of the media item (if applicable).
    type (Literal["image", "video", "voice", "roundvideo"]): The type of the media item.

Meta.title: Meta
Meta.description:
Represents metadata associated with content.

Attributes:
    offset (List[OffsetItem]): List of offset items.

More.title: More
More.description:
Represents additional content retrieved from a Telegram channel.

Attributes:
    posts (List[Post]): List of posts.
    meta (Meta): Metadata associated with the additional content.

OffsetItem.title: OffsetItem
OffsetItem.description:
Represents an offset item.

Attributes:
    before (Optional[int]): The offset before.
    after (Optional[int]): The offset after.

Poll.title: Poll
Poll.description:
Represents a poll within a post.

Attributes:
    name (str): The name of the poll.
    type (Optional[str]): The type of the poll.
    votes (str): The total number of votes in the poll.
    options (List[PollOptions]): List of options within the poll.

PollOptions.title: PollOptions
PollOptions.description:
Represents options within a poll.

Attributes:
    name (str): The name of the option.
    percent (int): The percentage of votes for the option.

Post.title: Post
Post.description:
Represents a post in a telegram channel.

Attributes:
    id (int): The unique identifier of the post.
    content (ContentPost): The content of the post.
    footer (Footer): The footer of the post.
    forwarded (Optional[Forwarded]): Information about forwarded post (if applicable).

Text.title: Text
Text.description:
Represents a text content within a post.

Attributes:
    text (str): The text string.
    entities (List[TextEntities]): List of text entities within the text.

TextEntities.title: TextEntities
TextEntities.description:
Represents text entities within a text.

Attributes:
    offset (int): The offset of the entity in the text.
    length (int): The length of the entity.
    type (Literal[
        "italic", "bold", "code", "spoiler", "strikethrough",
        "underline", "text_link", "url", "pre"
    ]):
    The type of the entity.
    language (Optional[str]): The language of the entity (if applicable).
